title: Eco-Chic Duplex with Bright, Airy Spaces in Trendy Wrzeszcz
description: Step into modern living in this beautiful eco-conscious duplex spanning 112 sqm. Featuring open-plan living, three generous bedrooms, and three stylish bathrooms, the space is thoughtfully designed for comfort and efficiency. The sun-flooded dining area seamlessly merges with the living room, perfect for relaxed gatherings. A spacious walk-in closet and naturally-lit work nook underscore versatile, contemporary living.
neighborhood_description: Located in the heart of Wrzeszcz, this duplex sits amidst Gdansk's most dynamic and growing neighborhoods. Enjoy local cafes, artisan shops, lush green spaces, and exceptional urban walkability. Residents benefit from a vibrant atmosphere, direct access to outdoor activities, and close proximity to top co-working spots.
lifestyle_benefits: quick access to nature trails and parks
easy transit link for digital nomads/remote workers
target_buyer: Ideal for eco-aware remote workers and young professionals seeking a stylish, sustainable home in a thriving urban locale.
market_positioning: A rare duplex in sought-after Wrzeszcz, blending innovative modern touches, eco-conscious living, and ideal space for productive remote work—perfectly positioned for Gdansk’s upwardly mobile and environmentally aware market.
